title: S rank on Team yet no Hextech
body:
Hello Riot, 
 This is the Second Game that Happens... I even Screen shot, I've only gotten 1 Box with Vi, and I missed on my Box with Janna and this time Karma... 
This time not even a Key ;'( (Unlucky) 
Whats going on with the Chests though?

replies.body:
Hey Spicy,

I see that you're having trouble with the Hextech Chests when someone on your team is doing super well and getting an S-rank. First, let's go through the basics together so we don't miss a beat.

* You can earn up to four chests at a time with a slot being available each week (after opening them).
* You earn a chest for achieving S-rank on a champion, and you won't be able to earn another with that champion until the end of the season.
* If someone in your premade group earns an S-rank, you'll receive a chest as well (tied to the champion you're playing--in this case Karma). This counts toward your champion until the end of the season.
* You can only earn chests if you're playing a champion you own so rented and Free Rotation champions don't count.

First, do you have any chest slots open? 
Second, you didn't earn an S-rank, but someone else on the team did and it sounds like you haven't earned a chest with Karma yet.
Third, were either players "somthing" or "Kale" part of your premade group?
Fourth, it looks like you already own Karma because you're playing Order of the Lotus Karma.
Lastly, keep in mind that the chests are sometime slow to be awarded as well.

If you've met all of those conditions and still have issues, I recommend contacting my colleagues through the [Support Site](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to see what's going on or if it was awarded late.

Nice description, but I have one tiny concern I'm sure is going to grow among the community sooner or later.
**At some point I won't be able to remember which champions I've earned chests with, is there any way to find out?**

I'm sure in a couple of months from now this will be a pretty huge topic.
In the client, go to your owned champions list in your profile. Ineligible champions will be marked with a gold border and have a highlighted chest in their tooltip.

Yep, Tysheth and TallyZrg are spot on and both methods work:

1. In your Champions Page in the PVP.net Client, champions which have already counted toward your earned chest will have a gold border.
2. Similarly, in your Champions Page in the PVP.net Client, if you hover over your champions, you'll see a chest on the bottom right corner. Gray means you have not earned a chest with that champion yet while gold means you have.
Would you mind adding in a way to check which champs you have chests on in champ select? Because I normally have no reason to go to my champ page in my profile.

You can also hover over the champion on your profile and if you see a "filled in" hextech box that means that you have earned a box on that champion for the season.

You can also view the "highest grade earned" for that champion too.
